column4: hey ty5479 i had the exact same setup/problem, it was a real bitch lol
these forums like saved my ass
Great.. lol Any idea where to point me?
im trying to rememember
Let me know if you remember. I'm following the online guides... But of course they didnt work in my case
right right
i remember it had something to do with the ubuntu install disk
oh yeah
you do an ubuntu live session and you go in terminal and you do install grub
i think thats it
i remember it turned out to be really simple after all
Yeah I'm on a live disk right now. Except when I try to install it i get an error
what's the error?
Mah2223: "grub-probe: error: cannot find a device for /boot/grub.
No path or device is specified.
Try ``grub-probe --help'' for more information.
Auto-detection of a filesystem module failed.
Please specify the module with the option `--modules' explicitly."
whoops
Mah2223: Did you get that?
yeah, wow
i never encountered that, i'm sorry- looks like you got yourself a doozy!
yeah I always do.
